first i will try it y myself and then i edit if it wont work.
it just won’t work please can you help.

item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

tank you for replying i will give you rep.
but now i get this error:
[s]NPCHandler.java:37: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int
if (player.distanceToPoint(npcs[npcId].absX, npc
s[npcId].absY) <= getDistanceForNpc(npcId) && npcGetsvar(npcId) && p.heightLevel
== npcs[npcId].heightLevel) {

                                       ^

1 error[/s]

o i forgot something and now it works
i have a next question:
i have a variable in my client.java varrockag.
and i want when that variable is 1 then they will be agresive but i don’t think that i can just add a IF statement.

item.title: Code error but i can't find wats wrong
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

      switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {

needs to be

      switch(npcs[npcId].npcType) {

and change

public int npcGetsvar(int npcId) {

to

public boolean npcGetsvar(int npcId) {

also change your returns back into true-false.

Read full topic

item.title: Code error but i can't find wats wrong
item.dc:creator: @kiprok kiprok
item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:5, topic:349602”][quote author=kiprok link=topic=445976.msg3273380#msg3273380 date=1279384554]

Please post the compiler error for anyone to help… -.-

sorry for that here it is:

NPCHandler.java:90: <identifier> expected public int npcGetsvar(npcId) { ^ 1 error Finished! Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
[/quote]

wow im surprised i didnt see it before, it needs to be public int npcGetsvar(int npcId) { [/quote]

if i do that i will get 4 errors:

[code]NPCHandler.java:37: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int
if (player.distanceToPoint(npcs[npcId].absX, npc
s[npcId].absY) <= getDistanceForNpc(npcId) && npcGetsvar(npcId) && p.heightLevel
== npcs[npcId].heightLevel) {

                                       ^

NPCHandler.java:91: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Npc
location: class NPCHandler
switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {
^
NPCHandler.java:94: incompatible types
found : boolean
required: int
return true;
^
NPCHandler.java:96: incompatible types
found : boolean
required: int
return false;
^
4 errors[/code]

i have chanced something and now i get 2 errors:

[code]NPCHandler.java:37: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int
if (player.distanceToPoint(npcs[npcId].absX, npc
s[npcId].absY) <= getDistanceForNpc(npcId) && npcGetsvar(npcId) && p.heightLevel
== npcs[npcId].heightLevel) {

                                       ^

NPCHandler.java:91: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Npc
location: class NPCHandler
switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {
^
2 errors[/code]

i chanced this:

return true; } return false; }

to

[code] return 10;

		default:
			return 10;
	}
}[/code]

item.title: Code error but i can't find wats wrong
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

try this.

   public int npcGetsvar(npcId) {
      switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {

      case 429:
         return true;
      }
         return false;
   }

the return false at the bottom is basically a default, if the case isnt in the switch then it automatically returns false.

Read full topic

item.title: Code error but i can't find wats wrong
item.dc:creator: @kiprok kiprok
item.description:
@kiprok wrote:

i have this script from combattscape for agresive npc’s but i get a error when compiled it.
this is the script

public void annoyNpcs(int npcId) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client player = (client)p; if (player.distanceToPoint(npcs[npcId].absX, npcs[npcId].absY) <= getDistanceForNpc(npcId) && npcGetsvar(npcId) && p.heightLevel == npcs[npcId].heightLevel) { if(npcGetsAnnoyed(npcId) && (npcs[npcId] != null) && (npcs[npcId].StartKilling == 0)) { npcs[npcId].StartKilling = player.playerId; npcs[npcId].IsUnderAttack = true; npcs[npcId].RandomWalk = false; AttackPlayer(player.playerId); } } } } } public int getDistanceForNpc(int Npc) { switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) { case 50: case 1115: case 1155: case 1160: case 2627: case 2630: case 2631: case 2738: case 2741: case 2743: case 2745: case 1472: return 100; case 2746: return 150; case 3200: case 63: case 1459: case 111: case 125: case 59: case 91: case 912: case 913: case 914: case 78: case 941: case 82: case 83: case 1153: case 1154: case 2263: case 2264: case 2265: return 10; 
		default:
			return 10;
	}
}

[color=red] public int npcGetsvar(npcId) {
switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {

		case 429:
	}
}</blockquote>

the red things is what i have added but can someone help what am i doing wrong(something ofcourse).

sorry for my bad english i am dutch and a noob.

Read full topic
